scripts.publish:patch: npm run test && npm version patch -m 'Release patch %s' && npm run push
scripts.publish:minor: npm run test && npm version minor -m 'Release minor %s' && npm run push
scripts.publish:major: npm run test && npm version major -m 'Release major %s' && npm run push
scripts.push: npm run build && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
